title.rendered: LEO A DALY Hospitality Projects Selected for Forbes Travel Guide’s 2024 Lists

content.rendered:
Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/leo-a-daly-hospitality-projects-selected-for-forbes-travel-guides-2024-lists-302069047.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com

excerpt.rendered: The Aurora Anguilla Resort & Golf Club has been awarded a five-star designation from Forbes Travel Guide for the second year in a row. In 2021 LEO A DALY designed renovations across the property. Pictured: beachside dining, one of several restaurants onsite. Photo © Kris Tamburello Photographer, courtesy of LEO A DALY Originally published at […]
